Title: Establishes the direct support professional credential pilot program
Summary: Establishes the direct support professional credential pilot program to initiate a program to continue to gain the expertise and knowledge of the developmental disabilities workforce and of the developmental disabilities workforce recruitment and retention needs throughout the field.
LawCode: Add ยง13.44, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing the direct support professional credential pilot program
